items.question: Which brands are available in my country?
items.answer: Solterra & Co. brands reach 3.4 billion people in 190 countries. Availability varies by region. Visit See Our Brands on our website or use Get In Touch to ask about your country. Our Solutions and Platform pages also outline where our brands and green energy solutions are offered.

items.question: Where can I find a media kit?
items.answer: Media kits and press resources are available under Communication or Resources on our website. You can also reach out via Get In Touch for specific media or partnership inquiries.

items.question: How do I set up an account?
items.answer: Account setup depends on whether you are a consumer, partner, or business. Visit Our Work, Platform, or How It Works on the site for steps, or use Get In Touch and we’ll guide you through the right process for your needs.

items.question: What is Solterra & Co.?
items.answer: Solterra & Co. is an inspired brands company focused on green energy and sustainability. We work toward a cleaner, healthier planet through clean, renewable energy and our brands—including The Ordinary Kit, Essential Beauty, and Solterra & Co. Stories—with a focus on confidence and making people a priority.

items.question: What are Solterra & Co.'s sustainability priorities?
items.answer: We focus on four sustainability priorities: Climate, Nature, Plastics, and Livelihoods. Our work includes solar electric programs, wind energy collection, and partnerships that cut costs and carbon footprints. Areas of impact include Diversity, SC Communities, SC Foundation, and Partners.

items.question: How can I join Solterra & Co. or explore careers?
items.answer: Visit the Careers section on our website to explore open roles and start your career at Solterra & Co. You can also sign up for our Green Horizon newsletter for insights on green energy solutions and company updates.

items.question: How do I get in touch or stay updated?
items.answer: Use Get In Touch on the website for general inquiries. Sign up for our newsletter for bite-sized insights on green energy and company updates. You can also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn for the latest from Solterra & Co.
